BatchCalcJobDefinition.description: Gathers job posting data from multiple objects and fields, transforms it, and stores it in job posting searchable field records.

filters.description: Identify Job Posting Searchable Field records without an associated Recruitment Posting record.
filters.label: Identify Records Without Reference Record
filters.name: Filter_invalid_Job_Posting_Searchable_Records

joins.description: Adds the ID of the Job Posting Searchable Field record that has a matching unique key to the fields collected while running the DPE definition.
joins.label: Add ID of the Record with Matching Unique Key to Fields
joins.name: Add_Existing_Record_Id_to_Assembled_Record_If_Records_Match

joins.description: Join name field from related Internal Organization Unit record

joins.name: Add_Job_Position_Fields

joins.name: Reverse_Join_Job_Posting_Searchable_Field_with_Denormalized_Record

BatchCalcJobDefinition.label: Aggregate Job Posting Details for Search

transforms.description: Calculates the pay range for the job position based on its minimum and maximum salary and selects a matching picklist value.
transforms.label: Calculate Pay Range
transforms.name: Calculate_Pay_Range_Picklist_Value

transforms.description: Creates a unique key for the Job Posting Searchable Field record.
transforms.label: Create Unique Key
transforms.name: Calculate_Unique_Key

writebacks.description: Deletes the records without an associated Recruitment Posting record.
